review_title: The WORST boxing game in VR
one_reviews_text: I'm pretty sure the 5 star reviews are all fake. You don't need to take my word for it. You can see my gameplay here: https://youtu.be/s73ftPFHJuI

review_title: My reasons why I dont like this game
one_reviews_text: This game isnt what I was expecting I was hoping for a real boxing ring not against a bunch of aliens. I was hoping for a real boxing experience
review_feedback: Sorry if there was confusion about the game package.  Once the servers get populated more with players, you will be able to battle other players in the arena, and this is currently the only boxing game that has that feature!  It is an adrenaline rush!!

one_reviews_text: I've never battled aliens before--this was awesome! They were so realistic and I really felt like I was fighting them.
